long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Super Light Note Taking App. Fast & Reliable.
-Right inside your browser
-100% Offline
-Auto Backup
-Dark Mode
-Support Diagram Notes such as Flow Chart Notes and Kanban Board Notes

Our app enables real-time note-taking, ensuring you capture key points instantly. 
Stay organized, collaborate seamlessly, and access your notes anytime, anywhere. 
Say hello to efficient, secure, and accessible meeting note-taking!

Update:
June 17th 2024
New Locking Feature with PIN Code to Protect Your Notes
Steps:
1. Set up a PIN code by clicking on the lock icon on top.
2. For existing notes, click the caret icon and then the lock icon.
3. To open a locked note, enter the PIN.
